Please note that our cash deals do not include VAT. We charge an additional admin fee of R3500 for license and registration, fuel and temp permit (if required).

We will tailor make a DEAL that will not only suit your needs but your pocket too. We have In-House finance options with all major financial institutions and always pride ourselves on giving you the best deal. CALL NOW and one of our experienced Sales Executives will gladly assist you in making your dreams come TRUE.

attributes.description:
At Kia Silverlakes we pride ourselves on delivering quality used vehicles to our clients. All our vehicles undergo a 125 quality point check, roadworthy and valet before being displayed on our showroom floor. All vehicles are delivered with a full service history and are accident free. The one thing we pride ourselves in more than anything is EXCELLENT CUSTOMER SERVICE. When buying a vehicle from us, you join the Kia Family and family look after each other. We will tailor make a package that will not only suit your needs but your pocket too. We deal through all major financial institutions and always pride ourselves on giving you the best deal. CALL NOW and one of our experienced Sales Executives will gladly bring the vehicle out to you to test drive from the comfort of your own home or workplace. CALL NOW and you could be driving off in the car of yours dreams.

Nationwide delivery. All Trade-in's welcome. Finance can be arranged, Contact us today! Price excludes on the road fees.

attributes.description:
At Kia Alberton, we pride ourselves on delivering high quality pre-owned vehicles. All our vehicles undergo a thorough 125-point quality check, roadworthy and valet.  

The one thing we pride ourselves in more than anything is EXCELLENT CUSTOMER SERVICE. When buying a vehicle from us, you join the Kia Alberton Family and family look after each other. We will structure a package that will not only suit your needs but your pocket too.   

Call now and one of our experienced Sales Executives will gladly bring the vehicle out to you or welcome you to our showroom to view and test drive the vehicle. 

Finance can be arranged through all major financial institutions, nationwide delivery available and all trade-ins accepted subject to view. Price excludes on the road fees.
